commands.spoiler: <input>: Hides letters in <input> from viewers until clicked
commands.image: <input>: Performs a google search for <input> and returns a random image
commands.image <xl, xr, yt, yb>: Mirrors an image (provided as an attachment) over the specified input
commands.gun: <input>: Looks up gungeon item with provided <input>
commands.drops: <input>: Looks up the drops of the <input> monster in MHGU
commands.item: <input>: Looks up the highest obtain rate for the <input> in MHGU
commands.weapon: <weaponType>: <quantity>: <attri: Returns a list of weapon from MHGU with the specified information.
commands./roll d<input>: Where <input> is any number, rolls from 1 to that number
commands./tell <input>: Sends a message to the same channel with the bot where text is the input
commands.@RemindMeBot remind me: <date>@@<info>: Sets a reminder to remind the user via DM of <info> at <date>
